amendment.description: Relative to the extension of the Protect America Act of 2007.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3918 withdrawn in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3918 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 45. Record Vote Number: 4.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3918 presented in Senate.

Amendment SA 3918 proposed by Senator Reid to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3911. (consideration: CR S302; text: S302) Relative to the extension of the Protect America Act of 2007.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3918 not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 45. Record Vote Number: 4.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3918 proposed by Senator Reid to language proposed to be stricken by amendment no. 3911.
